title: Viscore
author: Viscore
content: I'm tuning into the show right now, and it crossed my mind that I should start this thread to check if anyone here placed bets on this pageant.We're down to the top 5, and we're just about an hour away from finding out the winner. Here are the betting odds before the competition.https://www.thesportsgeek.com/blog/miss-universe-odds/QuoteNAME   COUNTRY   ODDSKarla Guilfú Acevedo   Puerto Rico   +1000Anntonia Porsild   Thailand   +1000Diana Leyre   France   +1200Celeste Viel   Chile   +1200Melissa Flores   Mexico   +1200Sheynnis Palacios   Nicaragua   +1200Maria Brechane   Brazil   +1200Jia Qi   China   +1200Shweta Sharda   India   +1200Ugochi Ihezue   Nigeria   +1200Erica Robin   Pakistan   +1200Angelina Usanova   Ukraine   +1200Noelia Voigt   USA   +1200Michelle Dee   Philippines   +1400

comments.author: Japinat
comments.body: The winner is Sheynnis Palacios from Nicaragua, and the odds was +1200. Lucky for those who spotted it right!I actually stopped watching the show when the Philippines wasn't included in the top 5. She got a lot of awards, so it's surprising that she wasn't part of the top 5. I thought she'd perform better in the Q and A part. The odds could have been better than the winner, which is at +1400.

comments.author: alastantiger
comments.body: It is strange that although I knew there was a Miss Universe competition ongoing as at yesterday, it never occurred to that the bookies will have it listed on their website. I don't think most gamblers in this community placed any bets on the just concluded event. You know we are mostly all about football, casinos, Boxing, other events are not as popular. Well, gotta keep my eyes on bookies that will give odds for the Mr Olympia and Strong Man competitions in 2024. It would be my first time so I will have to start from now to do my homework.

comments.author: angrybirdy
comments.body: Quote from: Japinat on November 19, 2023, 05:51:33 AMThe winner is Sheynnis Palacios from Nicaragua, and the odds was +1200. Lucky for those who spotted it right!I actually stopped watching the show when the Philippines wasn't included in the top 5. She got a lot of awards, so it's surprising that she wasn't part of the top 5. I thought she'd perform better in the Q and A part. The odds could have been better than the winner, which is at +1400.Same here, I stopped watching the live show after they announced the top 5 Finalist and PH is not included, However I think there's something fishy with the result because MU2023 Instagram page's posted the top 5 Finalist wherein Philippines is included. Anyways, Ms.Nicaragua is my bet since 1st day, I have no idea that there's a MU betting today, If only I had known, I would have won. Congrats to the new Ms. Universe 2023, To all participants and most specially, Congrats to Nicaragua for having the first ever Ms. Universe Crown title, which remarks in their country's history.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on November 19, 2023, 06:14:12 AMIt is strange that although I knew there was a Miss Universe competition ongoing as at yesterday, it never occurred to that the bookies will have it listed on their website. I don't think most gamblers in this community placed any bets on the just concluded event. You know we are mostly all about football, casinos, Boxing, other events are not as popular. Well, gotta keep my eyes on bookies that will give odds for the Mr Olympia and Strong Man competitions in 2024. It would be my first time so I will have to start from now to do my homework. Miss Universe is not what is done daily to many pageants, but anything can be used to bet on bookies and this is one of them. If you want to find another common one of this type, let United States presidential election become closer, you will see how many people will use it to bet. That is just every four years and also makes it not to be like casino games and sports like football.

Well, gotta keep my eyes on bookies that will give odds for the Mr Olympia and Strong Man competitions in 2024. It would be my first time so I will have to start from now to do my homework. Miss Universe is not what is done daily to many pageants, but anything can be used to bet on bookies and this is one of them. If you want to find another common one of this type, let United States presidential election become closer, you will see how many people will use it to bet. That is just every four years and also makes it not to be like casino games and sports like football.This is a type of special bet which many people don't do it.I personally only watch it and have no clue how the most beautiful girl in the world is choose,for sure I have seen better looking girls in porn videos   so this definitely does not decide that the girl that comes out as miss Universe is truly one of such kind.The people that bet of course have no clue either how to spot who is to be the winner so they hit it randomly the button to bet on any of these girls hoping to spot a win.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: Japinat on November 19, 2023, 05:51:33 AMThe winner is Sheynnis Palacios from Nicaragua, and the odds was +1200. Lucky for those who spotted it right!I actually stopped watching the show when the Philippines wasn't included in the top 5. She got a lot of awards, so it's surprising that she wasn't part of the top 5. I thought she'd perform better in the Q and A part. The odds could have been better than the winner, which is at +1400.           -  Just like you, when I found out that I didn't make it to the top 5 of our Stone Ms. Philippines, I lost the desire to watch. When it comes down to it, it's really hard for the Philippines to be in the top 5. What we as supporters think is that the opponents are not.Although it's not that easy for him to defeat his competitors, anyway, that's how we can choose to fight in this kind of battle. It's a good thing I didn't agree with my cousin to bet in case I lost a big amount.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on November 19, 2023, 10:02:16 AMThis is a type of special bet which many people don't do it.I personally only watch it and have no clue how the most beautiful girl in the world is choose,for sure I have seen better looking girls in porn videos   so this definitely does not decide that the girl that comes out as miss Universe is truly one of such kind.It is hard to know who is going to be the winner, but that does not mean it is the reason why people are not betting it. I do not know if many people are betting it but it will not be a surprise if many people bet on it. There are casino and bookmark games that many people are betting on that the bettors do not know what would likely be the outcome, example is roulette and dog racing and all others and people like having fun and betting on the games.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: There is no much awareness to this competition and most bookies may not have it listed for betting because the interest for bettors is also not high. Casinos are in for business and would be going for bets that will generate traffic for them. For me I have long been disinterested in Miss world that just comes yearly and after the competition, it just looks like nothing more to it. R’Bonney Gabriel of United States was the last winner but she won't be as popular as the last Ballon d'Or winner.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: did thesportsgeek allow bettors to cast bets even in then the final 5?i didn't watch but the neighborhood have been watching the pageant the whole time, the cheering is the constant noise in the neighborhood. the last time, el salvador national costume has a BTC logo on her head. nothing like this in 2024 pageant?

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Japinat on November 19, 2023, 05:51:33 AMThe winner is Sheynnis Palacios from Nicaragua, and the odds was +1200. Lucky for those who spotted it rightI’m sure only few spot this as winner since many is aiming for Thailand as winner due to the new owner of Miss U is from Bangkok which means there’s a high expectation to their representative.Miss Nicaragua is very solid inside out. A total package of both beauty, brain and charity works since he is an active animal rescuer even before Miss U. But betting on pageant in general is really very hard to win unless you are just doing it to support a candidate.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: electronicash on November 19, 2023, 02:56:03 PMdid thesportsgeek allow bettors to cast bets even in then the final 5?i didn't watch but the neighborhood have been watching the pageant the whole time, the cheering is the constant noise in the neighborhood. the last time, el salvador national costume has a BTC logo on her head. nothing like this in 2024 pageant?It was the 2022 Miss Universe pageant, Alejandra Guajardo, the Salvadoran beauty queen, wore a golden bitcoin-inspired outfit as a tribute to her country being the world’s first to adopt cryptocurrency as official currency. There's a Bitcoin logo part of the national costume but not on the head.https://www.rappler.com/entertainment/pageants/miss-el-salvador-golden-bitcoin-outfit-miss-universe-2022

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: Quote from: angrybirdy on November 19, 2023, 09:22:25 AMQuote from: Japinat on November 19, 2023, 05:51:33 AMThe winner is Sheynnis Palacios from Nicaragua, and the odds was +1200. Lucky for those who spotted it right!I actually stopped watching the show when the Philippines wasn't included in the top 5. She got a lot of awards, so it's surprising that she wasn't part of the top 5. I thought she'd perform better in the Q and A part. The odds could have been better than the winner, which is at +1400.Same here, I stopped watching the live show after they announced the top 5 Finalist and PH is not included, However I think there's something fishy with the result because MU2023 Instagram page's posted the top 5 Finalist wherein Philippines is included. Anyways, Ms.Nicaragua is my bet since 1st day, I have no idea that there's a MU betting today, If only I had known, I would have won. Congrats to the new Ms. Universe 2023, To all participants and most specially, Congrats to Nicaragua for having the first ever Ms. Universe Crown title, which remarks in their country's history. I also felt the same way since I support the Philippines of course it's my own country, I even bet some money with my cousins that she would be part of the top 5. I think the results are quite right as he mentioned, she won a lot of awards so it seems like they put a lot of reason for them to eliminate PH in the top 5 by raining of awards. What you have seen on Instagram might be a fake account of the Miss Universe cause for sure they have learned a lesson from the previous Miss Universe where Steve announced the winner wrong, it has an impact on the audience as well as the country. To be honest, I would really like to bet on Ms. Nepal cause she's actually beauty and I love how confident she is despite being curvy. But yeah other candidates really have a good answer in Q and A, still congrats to Nicaragua for winning MU2023.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: electronicash on November 19, 2023, 02:56:03 PMdid thesportsgeek allow bettors to cast bets even in then the final 5?i didn't watch but the neighborhood have been watching the pageant the whole time, the cheering is the constant noise in the neighborhood. Yeah. Live betting is available on most of the available bets especially on pageant like this which top 5 has different portion that will affect the current scoring like the Q&A. Sportsbook nowadays offers betting possibilities as much as possible as long as the event itself is still undetermined the winner.But some casino doesn’t offer live bet once the match is already halfway. It’s better to use big bookie since they are the one who keeps open the bet even on the final minutes of a game.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: This pageant is controversial as it looks like the Philippines got robbed. Fans praise Michelle Dee for Miss Universe 2023 run, saying she was ‘robbed’Filipino supporters haven't still moved on from the result, as there was a post on social media from the organizer stating that the Philippines was included in the top 5 but her name wasn't called, and she also has won a lot of awards.I'm just sharing this, but none of these, even if proven, would change the way the bets are graded.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on November 19, 2023, 06:14:12 AMIt is strange that although I knew there was a Miss Universe competition ongoing as at yesterday, it never occurred to that the bookies will have it listed on their website. I don't think most gamblers in this community placed any bets on the just concluded event. You know we are mostly all about football, casinos, Boxing, other events are not as popular. Well, gotta keep my eyes on bookies that will give odds for the Mr Olympia and Strong Man competitions in 2024. It would be my first time so I will have to start from now to do my homework.I was also surprised when yesterday I saw in the news that they had already announced the winner and when I entered this section I saw this thread, and I was surprised to know that this contest is something that is listed in bookmakers for people to place bets, I don't know and I don't understand how people analyze each participant so that they can choose which one will be the winner, as I don't understand anything about this contest, so I wouldn't bet on it, but I must say that the world is heading towards a strange path, I heard that in this contest they now accept that men who have become women also participateSo I'm wondering what the judges of this contest want, and when they talk about it being a women's contest, what it means to be a woman, nowadays we have serious problems in relation to sexual orientation, people change their sex and this is creating a lot of embarrassment , when I saw that a guy who changed his sex is participating in this contest, I thought: my god, where is the world going? and honestly, I just imagine the worst possible scenarios. This contest needs to establish criteria such as: being a woman, being X meters tall, having done X and Y things. Just like we see in boxing, MMA, football and other sports, they all have rules that anyone can know and are more transparent when deciding the winner

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on November 19, 2023, 06:14:12 AMIt is strange that although I knew there was a Miss Universe competition ongoing as at yesterday, it never occurred to that the bookies will have it listed on their website. I don't think most gamblers in this community placed any bets on the just concluded event. You know we are mostly all about football, casinos, Boxing, other events are not as popular. Well, gotta keep my eyes on bookies that will give odds for the Mr Olympia and Strong Man competitions in 2024. It would be my first time so I will have to start from now to do my homework. There are still a lot of gamblers that are interested in these events that are held annually. You can say that this might not be as popular as traditional sports but they still get a significant viewership, and a lot of people may want to be in the action, too. There have been some local betting events near my place that also went with the Miss Universe pageant yesterday and they managed to amass a lot of bettors in such a short span of time. Most bet on Ms. Philippines, though we know the outcome, and they were not happy with the candidate not even belonging to the top 5 finalists.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: dothebeats on November 20, 2023, 07:23:23 PMQuote from: alastantiger on November 19, 2023, 06:14:12 AMIt is strange that although I knew there was a Miss Universe competition ongoing as at yesterday, it never occurred to that the bookies will have it listed on their website. Well, gotta keep my eyes on bookies that will give odds for the Mr Olympia and Strong Man competitions in 2024. It would be my first time so I will have to start from now to do my homework. There are still a lot of gamblers that are interested in these events that are held annually. You can say that this might not be as popular as traditional sports but they still get a significant viewership, and a lot of people may want to be in the action, too. There have been some local betting events near my place that also went with the Miss Universe pageant yesterday and they managed to amass a lot of bettors in such a short span of time. Most bet on Ms. Philippines, though we know the outcome, and they were not happy with the candidate not even belonging to the top 5 finalists.I've seen some social media posts that Ms. Philippines is supposedly in the top 5, but suddenly her name disappeared and then enter the name of the host country? So there has been another controversial that involved Ms. Philippines. Maybe because the country has been dominating this pageant for the last 5-6 years?In any case, I will agree though that there are also some gamblers who bet on this kind of beauty pageant.It's not the traditional betting that we have seen, but it's obvious that whether fiat or crypto based every year this kind of betting is open because it also has a huge followers from gamblers, maybe non gamblers but they simply bet on this specific pageant.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Jating on November 20, 2023, 09:13:46 PMI've seen some social media posts that Ms. Philippines is supposedly in the top 5, but suddenly her name disappeared and then enter the name of the host country? So there has been another controversial that involved Ms. Philippines. Maybe because the country has been dominating this pageant for the last 5-6 years?It is an honest mistake but up until now there's no apology from the Miss Universe organizers we have another Steve Harvey moment here and such a thing should not happen anymore because we have seen this kind of mistake and what will make the fans of the participant in the issue and in this case Miss Philippines, it's ok for Miss Philipines Michelle Marques Dee but not for pageant fans of the Philippines and Philippines happens to be big pageant fans and even pageant experts are asking for an explanation.Steve Harvey moment? Pageant expert wants explanation on Miss U Top 5 graphics mix-up

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 20, 2023, 09:35:34 PMQuote from: Jating on November 20, 2023, 09:13:46 PMI've seen some social media posts that Ms. Philippines is supposedly in the top 5, but suddenly her name disappeared and then enter the name of the host country? So there has been another controversial that involved Ms. Philippines. Maybe because the country has been dominating this pageant for the last 5-6 years?It is an honest mistake but up until now there's no apology from the Miss Universe organizers we have another Steve Harvey moment here and such a thing should not happen anymore because we have seen this kind of mistake and what will make the fans of the participant in the issue and in this case Miss Philippines, it's ok for Miss Philipines Michelle Marques Dee but not for pageant fans of the Philippines and Philippines happens to be big pageant fans and even pageant experts are asking for an explanation.Steve Harvey moment? Pageant expert wants explanation on Miss U Top 5 graphics mix-upWhy these things turns out to be that something to be obvious that it is really that intentional? Mistakes like these are really that simple or it is really just that impossible that they would really be letting it slipor there's really something happening out there? or they do really just love on making some scene which it would really be making out some noise. Of course it wont really be somethinga simple thing that Philippine fans would really be skipping out easily. There's always a question on how and why it did happen.Organizers at least should be minding on giving out some explanation for this one so because if not then credibility of such pageant would really be questionable or somethingthat cant be trusted anymore if this one continues.
